items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Man City defender Gvardiol
items.description: Manchester City defender Josko Gvardiol is a target for Barcelona. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

items.title: Down 17-0, Tide 'keep fighting' to stun Sooners
items.description: No. 9 seed Alabama rallied to beat No. 8 Oklahoma 34-24 in the College Football Playoff first round Friday.

items.title: Joshua bides time, batters Paul in sixth-round KO
items.description: It took longer than many predicted, but Anthony Joshua finally hunted down Jake Paul, dropping him four times in a sixth-round knockout victory Friday...

items.title: Edwards returns, helps Wolves hand OKC 3rd loss

items.title: Sources: Rockets expand talks to buy, move Sun
items.description: Rockets ownership is in substantive talks with the Connecticut Sun over the potential purchase and relocation of the WNBA franchise to Houston, source...
